spec_data.Name: fusionforge-mta-exim4
spec_data.Description:
FusionForge provides many tools to aid collaboration in a
development project, such as bug-tracking, task management,
mailing-lists, SCM repository, forums, support request helper,
web/FTP hosting, release management, etc. All these services are
integrated into one web site and managed through a web interface.

This package configures the Exim 4 mail transfer agent to run
FusionForge.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:04:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Collaborative development tool - mail tools (using Exim 4)
